Saturday, May 17, 2014 11:49 AM

Examples

Basic templating.

`
index.php

display('index.tpl', array( 'page.title'=>'This is my template', 'page.content'=>'I made this page using TemplateLib!' )); ?>

index.tpl



{{page.title}}


{{page.title}}


{{page.content}}




`

Now load index.php in your web browser!
